editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Images 1r-3l: Asmat Prayers for protection against the evil eye. Images 6r-19r: Image of the Keeping Angel Who[se name] cannot be Translated, መልክዐ ዑቃቤ. Incipit: ሰላም ለዝክረ ስምከ ተዳሞ። ዘኢይትከሃል ለተርጒሞ። Not in Répertoire. Images 19r-24l: Prayer to God, "Come and Let us Cry to Him," ንዑ ንብኪ ኢይሜንነነ. Image 24l-25l: Prayer to God, "Praise to God Adonai", ግናይ ለ'እግዚአብሔር አዶናይ. Images 25l-31r: Evening prayer to Mary. Images 31r-36r. Prayer to God calling on Saint Gabra Manfas Qeddus. Images 36r-47r: Prayer to God calling Saint Mary. Images 48l-55l: Prayer to God calling on Saint George. Images 55l-57l: Prayer to the Trinity. Images 57l-57r: Greeting to Mary, Répertoire 98. Images 57r-74l: Image of the Passion of the Cross, Mälk‘a Ḥǝmamatä Mäsqäl, መልክአ፡ ሕማማት፡, Répertoire 91. Incipit: ሰላም: ለኪ: ማርያም: ድንግል: ዘመዓዛ: አፉኪ: ኮል, arranged for the hours of the day. Images 74r-122r: Praises of Mary, arranged for the days of the week. In a mahdar. Images 122-138l: Treatise on Mary, in Amharic. Rebound with two chain stitches. Images 138r-149r: Image of Lalibela, መልክአ: ላሊበላ:. Not listed in Répertoire. EMIP 713. Incipit: እስመ: ብዙኃን: አኃው: እለ: እሙንቱ: ቀደሙኒ: Images 150-157l: Image of Jeremiah, Répertoire 118. Images 157r-162l: Prayer to the Saints. lIllumination mentioning Qesis ተስፋየ ገብረ ማርያም. Image 1r: scribal exercise on the alphabet and on the trinitarian formula. Image 19r mentions the owner, አርካንዮስ.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
